text.div:
This code system http://hl7.no/fhir/CodeSystem/no-basis-connection-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
no-ebxml-2 ebXML 2.0ebXML messaging as described in the Norwegian profile HIS 1037:2011 based on OASIS ebMS 2.0 specification
no-amqp AMQPAMQP based synchronuous and asynchronus message delivery

name: NoBasisConnectionType
title: no-basis-connection-type.codesystem
description: Codes to describe Norwegian message based communication protocols.

concept.definition: ebXML messaging as described in the Norwegian profile HIS 1037:2011 based on OASIS ebMS 2.0 specification
AMQP based synchronuous and asynchronus message delivery
